message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. That's a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying right now.  I'd be willing to pay $85 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $120 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down a bit.  $105 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm sticking with my previous offer of $85.  If you're not willing to go that low, I'll have to look elsewhere.
